locations.description: A divided dorm with separate areas for nobles and common students.

npcs.name: Nobleman’s Son: Elian
dialogue: People like you don’t belong near me.
Don’t think you’re better than me.
My father won’t hear about this.

npcs.name: Dangerous criminal: Rovan
dialogue: So you came to stare at the monster… just like everyone else.
I don’t trust anyone. And you won’t be an exception.
Don’t look at me like that… I lost, but you didn’t break me.
The world may have rejected me, but I will never bow.

locations.description: Rows of desks, simple magical diagrams on the walls, and a cabinet of teaching tools.
A large central worktable, instruments and vials on side desks, and marked circles for experiments.
Long tables, tall bookshelves, a reading carpet, and a quiet corner with lamps.

npcs.name: Mia’s friend: Lynne
dialogue: Mia, you always look so calm… it’s honestly inspiring.
Could you come with me for a moment? I want to show you something downstairs.
Just step inside. I’ll close the door so no one interrupts us.
Did you really think you could outshine me forever?
Maybe now you’ll finally understand your place.

locations.description: A nearly empty room with mirrors, an illusion control panel, and marked circles for practice.
Beds for healing practice, herb cabinets, a worktable, and shelves of potions.
Shelves of crates and boxes, a sorting table, a locked chest, and an inventory list on the wall.
A forgotten room filled with dust, old supplies, and the secrets of Mia’s disappearance.

items.name: Potion of Strength
items.description: A very rare potion. No one would expect to find it in an abandoned room. When consumed, it greatly increases the drinker's strength. Can be used only once.

items.name: Totem of Immortality
items.description: A legendary artifact that does not appear under normal circumstances. According to legend, the totem activates automatically when its bearer is on the brink of death, protecting their life and generating a temporary shield.

items.name: Gunpowder
items.description: A common material often used in weapon crafting. It has no function on its own — its value appears only when combined with the right materials.

items.name: Sand
items.description: A basic material with no standalone use. Serves as a raw crafting ingredient.

items.name: Gravel
items.description: A common material without its own function. Used in crafting.

quests.name: Defeat Elian
quests.description: Elian stands in your way. Defeat him to prove your strength and continue your journey.

quests.name: Craft an explosive
quests.description: Gather the necessary materials and craft an improvised explosive device.

quests.name: Defeat the criminal Rovan
quests.description: Rovan is a dangerous criminal hiding in the forest. Track him down and defeat him.

quests.name: Find a bone for Togo
quests.description: Togo is hungry and needs a bone to feed himself. Search the area and bring him one.
